data.name: Pizza meat
data.description: A meat lover's paradise! This pizza is loaded with a variety of succulent meats, providing a hearty and satisfying flavor experience.

data.name: Pizza pepperoni
data.description: The classic pepperoni pizza, featuring spicy pepperoni slices on a bed of rich tomato sauce and melted cheese.

data.name: Pizza village
data.description: Transport yourself to a charming village with this pizza, showcasing a delightful mix of traditional flavors and wholesome ingredients.

data.name: Pizza caesar
data.description: A classic pizza inspired by the timeless Caesar salad. Indulge in the perfect combination of fresh ingredients and savory flavors.

data.name: Pizza girls
data.description: A fun and vibrant pizza for the girls! Packed with colorful and delicious toppings, it's a party on every slice.

data.name: Pizza hawaiian
data.description: Transport your taste buds to the tropics with this Hawaiian-inspired pizza. Enjoy the perfect blend of ham, pineapple, and cheese.

data.name: Pizza oleole
data.description: An exotic pizza experience with the OleOle twist! Savor unique flavors and spices that make every bite a culinary adventure.

data.name: Pizza plus
data.description: Take your pizza experience to the next level with Pizza Plus! Loaded with extra toppings and flavors, it's a taste sensation.

data.name: Pizza vesuvius
data.description: Experience the fiery flavors of Vesuvius with this bold and spicy pizza. It's an eruption of taste that will leave you craving more.

data.description: Experience the authentic taste of sushi with our classic Sushi roll. Fresh ingredients and expert craftsmanship for sushi enthusiasts.

data.description: Indulge in the elegance of Black Sushi. A visually stunning sushi roll with a unique blend of flavors and premium ingredients.

data.name: Fresh sushi
data.description: Savor the freshness with our Fresh Sushi roll. Bursting with vibrant flavors and the finest ingredients for a delightful sushi experience.

data.name: Nisuaz
data.description: Nisuaz offers a delightful twist on traditional sushi. Enjoy a fusion of flavors that will surprise and delight your taste buds.

data.name: Sushi smoke
data.description: Dive into the rich and smoky flavors of Sushi Smoke. A unique sushi roll that combines traditional taste with a hint of smokiness.

data.name: Tanuki
data.description: Discover the playful and delicious Tanuki sushi roll. A creative combination of ingredients that brings joy and flavor to every bite.

data.name: Burrito
data.description: A savory and satisfying Burrito filled with a delicious blend of ingredients. A classic choice for a hearty and flavorful meal.

data.name: Cheeseburger
data.description: Indulge in the cheesy goodness of our Cheeseburger Taco. A fusion of taco and classic cheeseburger flavors in every bite.

data.name: Combo Pizza
data.description: Experience the best of both worlds with our Combo Pizza Taco. The perfect combination of taco and pizza flavors for a delightful meal.

data.name: Fusion
data.description: A unique Fusion Taco that brings together diverse flavors and ingredients for a taste that's both familiar and exciting.

data.name: Rome pizza
data.description: Embark on a culinary journey with our Rome Pizza Taco. A taco inspired by the classic flavors of Rome, bringing a taste of Italy to your taco experience.

data.name: Udon
data.description: Savor the delicious and comforting Udon Taco. A unique twist on traditional tacos with the rich and hearty flavors of Japanese udon noodles.
